items.sentence: Doing that didn't take as much time as I expected.
Pedestrians who jaywalk sometimes cause accidents.
It's pointless to try to stop Tom from doing that.
Tom isn't taller than Mary, and John isn't either.
I'd like to go to either Australia or New Zealand.
Sometimes Tom says things that he doesn't believe.
The room was so smoky that I could hardly breathe.
I think our P.E. teacher really has it out for me.
This is Tom's T-shirt. That T-shirt is Tom's, too.
The plan Tom suggested would save even more money.
